metadata.title: Citibike Route Planner

metadata.keywords: citibike, bike share, route planner, NYC, transportation

routeProfile.title: Route Preference

safest.name: Safest

insane.name: Insane
insane.description: Shortest path, ignores traffic rules & lights

routePopularity.noData: This route hasn't been recorded in the public data yet. It might be a new or rarely-used route.

insights.rare: üåü You're pioneering a less-common route! Double-check bike availability before heading out.

publicDataImport.noDataYet: No public trip data imported yet. Upload a JSON file to get started.

header.title: Usage Benchmarking

noPublicData.title: No Public Data Available

noPersonalTrips.title: No Personal Trips

ridingPatterns.title: Riding Patterns
ridingPatterns.moreUsage: You ride {{difference}}% more during this time
ridingPatterns.lessUsage: You ride {{difference}}% less during this time

insights.ebikeDistance: üí° E-bike trips are typically {{percentage}}% longer in distance on average

login.message: Please log in to normalize your trip data

header.title: Trip Data Normalization
header.description: Enhance your trip data with detailed analysis and insights

hourlyRate.label: Your Hourly Rate (for time value calculation)
hourlyRate.description: Used to calculate time value savings

features.title: What gets normalized:
features.resolveStations: Resolve "Unknown" station names using GBFS coordinates
features.calculateDistances: Calculate accurate distances (from polylines or haversine)
features.calculateCosts: Calculate trip costs (e-bike fees, overage fees)
features.categorize: Categorize by distance, duration, and time of day
features.calculateScores: Calculate suitability scores and net value

success.title: Success!
success.message: All trips have been normalized. You can now view detailed analytics.

errors.loginRequired: Please log in to view your trip economics
errors.noTripData: No trip data found. Please sync your trips first.

header.title: Transportation Economics
header.description: Analyze your Citibike usage and compare costs to subway alternatives

valuePerTrip.title: Value per Trip
valuePerTrip.includes: Includes cost savings, time value, and health benefits

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Citibike Route Planner is a personal, open-source project. Your privacy is important

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: All data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB. No data is sent to external servers except:

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.mapbox: Mapbox: Used for map rendering and route calculation
thirdParty.gbfs: Citibike GBFS API: Used for real-time station data
thirdParty.citibikeApi: Citibike API: Used for optional account login and trip sync (stored locally)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: If you connect your Citibike account, we use httpOnly cookies to store authentication tokens securely. These are not accessible via JavaScript and are only used for API authentication

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: All trip data, preferences, and saved routes are stored in your browser's IndexedDB. You can clear this data at any time from your browser settings or from within the app

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions or concerns, please open an issue on

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using this Citibike Route Planner, you agree to these terms

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: This is a personal, non-commercial project. Use at your own risk. The developer is not affiliated with Citibike or Lyft

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee real-time station data or route accuracy. Always verify station availability before your trip

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: The developer is not liable for any issues arising from use of this app, including but not limited to: incorrect route information, station availability errors, or data loss

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: These terms may be updated at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of any changes

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This project is open source. You can view the source code on

hooks.useToastRequired: useToast must be used within a ToastProvider
hooks.useI18nRequired: useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider
hooks.useThemeRequired: useTheme must be used within a ThemeProvider
